fullplot: A look into the many lives of Christa Pèffgen, otherwise known as Nico; from cutie German mèdchen to the first of the supermodels, to glamorous diva of the Velvet Underground, to cult item, junkie and hag. Many faces for the same woman, whom, you realize, just couldn't bring herself to care enough to live.
